articles.author: Joe Wilkins
articles.title: Top African Health Official Blasts Trump Administration's Plans for Human Experimentation in Africa - Futurism
articles.description: In a press conference, the director-general of the Africa CDC addressed plans for a controversial hepatitis B vaccine trial.
articles.content: Last week, officials at the Africa Centres for Disease Control and Prevention (Africa CDC) announced that health authorities in Guinea-Bissau had moved to halt a controversial study which would have … [+4010 chars]
